name: kp5-academy-sports-management
description: Full-featured sports management system with web and mobile applications

scripts.setup: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.setup:firebase: npm run firebase:setup && npm run firebase:init
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run firebase:emulators"
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
